title: initial infection vector
extract: March 2017) (Learn how and when to remove this template message) A vector in computing, specifically when talking about malicious code such as viruses or worms, is the method that this code uses to propagate itself or infect a computer. This sense is similar to, and derived from, its meaning in biology.
